original_title: The Other Side of the Road
overview: Wim Wenders has directed a The Other Side of the Road, a 6-minute filmmercial for the introduction of the Audi A3. Some grungy couple, a sleek couple, a lot of desert driving, cleverly placed signs with the ad agencyâ€™s slogans: admire me, push me, love me, etc.
title: The Other Side of the Road
